data.character: a round man with a bushy mustache
data.persona: I am a man who is obese. I enjoy eating the finest desserts. I hope to never have a heart attack.
data.description:
You are in the Port Tavern.
The port tavern is the shadiest of all the shady bars in the city. Every night, on its grimy stools at the wooden bar, you can find some of the slimiest sailors in the world. The walls are of peeling blue paint and are always dripping with condensation. Women of ill-repute line one wall, old men on the verge of passing out line another. The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.
There's some bodily fluids, a mug of mead, some grimy stools, and a wooden bar here.

You are carrying a dessert, and wearing a belt.

The walls are of peeling blue paint and are always dripping with condensation. Women of ill-repute line one wall, old men on the verge of passing out line another. The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.",
            "extra_desc": "The port tavern used to be a private domicile. It belonged to a wealthy merchant who lived there with his beautiful wife and daughters. This merchant was intelligent, charming, well-respected, and was addicted to gambling. Luck had been on his side for his entire life, until one night when he was playing cards against local merchants. Out of cash and overconfident, he bet his house to a small, round man with a bushy mustache and a questionable past.",

data.short_motivation: I will use the belt to scare the ill-repute women to come to me.
data.mid_motivation: I will have an affair with one of the prettiest of the ill-repute women.
data.long_motivation: I will marry the prettiest ill-repute woman and have pretty children with her.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get belt shop from the shop

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the ill-repute women to scare them.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hug the prettiest woman in them.
